sentences.en: Agents also some old customers of the special procurement process.
sentences.cn: 也代理一些老客户的特殊的采购加工.

sentences.en: Back - office: interfacing with database, accounting, procurement, expense management, spreadsheets, etc.
sentences.cn: 后勤办公室: 界面与数据库, 会计, 采购, 支出管理, 电子表格等.

sentences.en: Costs for equipment mainly cover research, experimentation, procurement, maintenance, transportation and storage.
sentences.cn: 装备费主要用于武器装备的科研 、 试验 、 采购 、 维修 、 运输和储存等.

sentences.en: Develop Technical content for Long Lead item procurement, if necessary.
sentences.cn: 如果必要,为长周期设备采购编制技术内容.

sentences.en: He is in charge of the procurement of materials.
High Quality , Quick Return , Low Price , Components Procurement, One - stop Service.
sentences.cn: 保证质量﹑快速交货 ﹑ 收费低廉.代客购买零件, 一条龙式服务.

sentences.en: It was squarely up to me to decide whether or not the procurement of an armistice.
sentences.cn: 是否赢取停战协定之决定,完全落在我一人身上.

sentences.en: Maybe we should just let Wal - Mart handle Pentagon procurement.
sentences.cn: 也许我们应该让沃而玛来负责五角大楼的采购呢.

sentences.en: More and more , human food procurement came to have a dominant effect on their evolution.
sentences.cn: 人类获取食物愈来愈显著地影响到人类的进化.

sentences.en: Now , electrical procurement , as a new method ato decrease the product cost.
sentences.cn: 电子化采购是一种降低成本的新的采购方式.

sentences.en: Procurement managers are still not responding to the low prices.
sentences.cn: 虽然钢价低位运行,但采购经理们重采意愿依旧很弱.

sentences.en: Russia was cutting procurement of new weapons "by about 80 percent," he said.
sentences.cn: 他说俄罗斯正“以大约百分之八十的幅度”削减新武器的补给。

sentences.en: Some suggestions for improvement of e - procurement in Chinese apparel enterprises are given.
sentences.cn: 提出了改进中国服装企业电子采购的若干建议.

sentences.en: Such action may result in suspension of the procurement process.
sentences.cn: 此种行动可能造成该采购过程的中止.

sentences.en: Understand the whole process of material procurement, payment and production.
sentences.cn: 对材料从采购 、 交付及生产有一定了解.

sentences.en: We rl try to work as procurement agent on behalf of csk.
sentences.cn: 作为CSK公司的采办代理,我们将尽心尽力.

trans.tran_en: Procurement is the act of obtaining something such as supplies for an army or other organization
